config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The getScalingAlgorithm method returns the upScalingAlgorithm if the type is UPSCALING, otherwise it returns the downScalingAlgorithm.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration is triggered whenever the type parameter is passed to the getScalingAlgorithm method.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the configuration option is that it determines which scaling algorithm to use for upscaling or downscaling operations in the system.
